animeDescription: Ai is a self-reliant girl that moves to Animal Village. She makes friends with the various villagers as she settles into the village. One night as she walked along the beach, she finds a message in the bottle. It sets her off on a quest of planting pine trees around the village to fulfill a miracle on the eve of the Winter Festival.  (Source: ANN)
animeVoices: ['Fukuen, Misato', 'Horie, Yui', 'Kobayashi, Yuu', 'Hino, Yurika', 'Orikasa, Fumiko', 'Tatsuta, Naoki', 'Oguri, Shun', 'Terasoma, Masaki']
